<script>
(function() {
  var correct = "test123"; 
  var maxTries = 1;
  var lockMinutes = 10;
  var now = Date.now();

  var failData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("news_fail")) || {count:0, lockedUntil:0};

  function denyAndRedirect(msg){
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
      var seconds = 3;
      document.body.innerHTML =
        "<h2 id='deny-msg' style='text-align:center;margin-top:20%;color:#c00;font-family:sans-serif;'>"
        + "â›” Access Denied â›”<br>" + msg + "<br><br>"
        + "Redirecting to homepage in <span id='countdown'>" + seconds + "</span> secondsâ€¦</h2>";

      var countdownEl = document.getElementById("countdown");
      var timer = setInterval(function(){
        seconds--;
        if (seconds <= 0) {
          clearInterval(timer);
          location.href = "/";
        } else {
          countdownEl.textContent = seconds;
        }
      }, 1000);
    });
  }

  if (now < failData.lockedUntil) {
    denyAndRedirect("Please try again later.");
  } else {
    failData.count = 0;
    localStorage.setItem("news_fail", JSON.stringify(failData));

    var ok = false;
    for (var i = 0; i < maxTries; i++) {
      var input = prompt("ðŸ”’ ("+(maxTries - i)+" attempts left):");
      if (input === correct) { ok = true; break; }
      else { failData.count++; }
    }

    if (!ok) {
      failData.lockedUntil = now + lockMinutes * 60 * 1000;
      localStorage.setItem("news_fail", JSON.stringify(failData));
      denyAndRedirect("<br>Please try again in "+lockMinutes+" minutes.");
    }
  }
})();
</script>
